com.pump.swing

Class ShapeCreationPanel.SelectionModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.swing.ShapeCreationPanel.SelectionModel
  • Enclosing class:
    ShapeCreationPanel

    public static class ShapeCreationPanel.SelectionModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This manages the selection and indication of a ShapeCreationPanel.

    The "selection" probably needs to explanation, but "indication" is a less universal concept. Also known as "rollover" or other possible names, Jef Raskin defines indication as, "highlighting the single object pointed to as the cursor is moved, without any other user action such as clicking."

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SelectionModel(ShapeCreationPanel shapePanel)
      Create a selection model for a ShapeCreationPanel.

        the current indication.

        The "selection" probably needs no explanation, but "indication" is a less universal concept. Also known as "rollover" or other possible names, Jef Raskin defines indication as, "highlighting the single object pointed to as the cursor is moved, without any other user action such as clicking."

      • select

        public void select(int shapeIndex,
                   int nodeIndex,
                   ShapeCreationPanel.Handle handle)
        Change the current selection, and notify listeners if a change occurred.
        Parameters:
        shapeIndex - the index of the shape to select
        nodeIndex - the index of the node within the shape to select
        handle - the handle (of the node of the shape) to select.

      • indicate

        Change the current indication, and notify listeners if a change occurred.
        Parameters:
        shapeIndex - the index of the shape to indicate
        nodeIndex - the index of the node within the shape to indicate
        handle - the handle (of the node of the shape) to indicate.
